name: Tothlandia Battle Sim v0.9.1 (Desktop Version)
description:
In the unforgiving world of Tothlandia, every major civilization is run by high school students. This inevitably results in conflict and petty squabbles, settled by gambling innocent lives in the struggle for supremacy.

This sim is a companion tool designed for use with the Tothlandia student civ sim experience. The app can currently support up to 200 units on screen at once with minimal impact on performance. A web version is in the works but is not guaranteed.
